seprhou.logic

Interface AirspaceObjectFactory


  • public interface AirspaceObjectFactory
    Interface which is responsible for creating all the new aircraft in the game

    By implementing this class, you can control when all aircraft are generated, what the aircraft are, and what their flight plans are.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AirspaceObject makeObject(Airspace airspace, float delta)
      Creates a new airspace object

    • Method Detail

      • makeObject

        AirspaceObject makeObject(Airspace airspace,
                        float delta)
        Creates a new airspace object

        This method is called every game refresh to create a game aircraft. Most of the time, this method would return null - indicating that no aircraft are to be introduced this turn.

        Parameters:
        airspace - the airspace the object will be created in
        delta - time (in seconds) since last game refresh
        Returns:
        the new object or null to create no object this refresh
